item.title: Trend Micro fixes critical vulnerabilities in multiple products
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Trend Micro has released security updates to address multiple critical-severity remote code execution and authentication bypass vulnerabilities that impact its Apex Central and Endpoint Encryption (TMEE) PolicyServer products. [...]

item.title: Google Cloud and Cloudflare hit by widespread service outages
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Google Cloud and Cloudflare are investigating ongoing outages impacting access to sites and various services across multiple regions. [...]

item.title: Graphite spyware used in Apple iOS zero-click attacks on journalists
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Forensic investigation has confirmed the use of Paragon's Graphite spyware platform in zero-click attacks that targeted Apple iOS devices of at least two journalists in Europe. [...]

item.title: Password-spraying attacks target 80,000 Microsoft Entra ID accounts
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Hackers have been using the TeamFiltration pentesting framework to target more than 80,000 Microsoft Entra ID accounts at hundreds of organizations worldwide. [...]

item.title: Microsoft Edge now offers secure password deployment for businesses
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft announced that a new Edge feature allowing employees to share passwords more securely in enterprise environments has reached general availability. [...]

item.title: GitLab patches high severity account takeover, missing auth issues
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: GitLab has released security updates to address multiple vulnerabilities in the company's DevSecOps platform, including ones enabling attackers to take over accounts and inject malicious jobs in future pipelines. [...]

item.title: Windows 11 24H2 emergency update fixes Easy Anti-Cheat BSOD issue
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has released an emergency Windows 11 24H2 update to address an incompatibility issue triggering restarts with blue screen of death (BSOD) errors on systems with Easy Anti-Cheat. [...]

item.title: Fog ransomware attack uses unusual mix of legitimate and open-source tools
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Fog ransomware hackers are using an uncommon toolset, which includes open-source pentesting utilities and a legitimate employee monitoring software called Syteca. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT o3 API 80% price drop has no impact on performance
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: ChatGPT o3, which has been available via API, is now 80% cheaper for developers, and there's no visible impact on performance. [...]

item.title: SmartAttack uses smartwatches to steal data from air-gapped systems
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new attack dubbed 'SmartAttack' uses smartwatches as a covert ultrasonic signal receiver to exfiltrate data from physically isolated (air-gapped) systems. [...]

item.title: Erie Insurance confirms cyberattack behind business disruptions
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Erie Insurance and Erie Indemnity Company have disclosed that a weekend cyberattack is behind the recent business disruptions and platform outages on its website. [...]

item.title: Zero-click AI data leak flaw uncovered in Microsoft 365 Copilot
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new attack dubbed 'EchoLeak' is the first known zero-click AI vulnerability that enables attackers to exfiltrate sensitive data from Microsoft 365 Copilot from a user's context without interaction. [...]
